message.content:
cs.NI, cs.IT, cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.MM

The paper discusses the use of visible light for communication and sensing, which falls under the category of networking and internet architecture (cs.NI). The paper also discusses the modulation of light sources and the use of photodetectors, which are topics related to information theory (cs.IT). The paper proposes a taxonomy to analyze these novel contributions, which is a machine learning technique (cs.LG). The paper also mentions the use of external surfaces of objects, such as fingers and car roofs, which are topics related to computer vision (cs.CV) and multimedia (cs.MM).
